name: The Typing of the Spec
description:
The Typing of the Spec

The Typing of the Spec is an edutainment videogame for the Sinclair ZX Spectrum home computer. The goal is to quickly type the words as they are displayed on the screen, before the time runs out. On successful typing of a word, the remaining time is added to your current score. You lose a life whenever you type a wrong character or the time runs out.

The Typing of the Spec is my third entry to the 2021 edition of the BASIC 10 Liner Contest, PUR-80 category.
If you like it, please like this tweet to support it by voting for the contest "Public's Choice" special award. Thanks!

Emulation powered by JSSpeccy.
